meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>purple</kanji> <kanji>outside</kanji> <kanji>line</kanji> is the color spectrum that's outside purple. Those are <vocabulary>ultraviolet rays</vocabulary> (the lines are the rays).
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
